name: TBD (1StepCloser)
description:
This is merely a proof of concept, not a complete game. All features are subject to change. Project development started on December 2, 2021. Loading may take a while, if there are issues, try refreshing the page, if there are still issues, there's a Windows build below.

 What type of game is this?

A turn-based strategy game with auto-battler features.
